name: pumpkaboo-large

flavor_text_entries.x:
The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit
trapped in this world. As the sun sets,
it becomes restless and active.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It is said to carry wandering spirits
to the place where they belong
so they can move on.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit
trapped in this world. As the sun sets,
it becomes restless and active.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It is said to carry wandering spirits
to the place where they belong
so they can move on.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Spirits that wander this world are placed into
Pumpkaboo’s body. They’re then moved on to
the afterlife.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
The light that streams out from the holes in the
pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people
and Pokémon that see it.

form_descriptions: Forms have different stats.  Pumpkaboo's size is set when it is encountered, and cannot be changed.
